Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about attending TEDxDPS Monarch Intl School Youth.

Registration & Tickets

Do I need a ticket to attend?+

Yes, registration is mandatory. While the event is free, we have limited capacity (100 seats) and require advance registration to ensure proper planning. Register through our website to secure your spot.

Is the event really free?+

Yes! TEDxDPS Monarch Intl School Youth is completely free to attend. There are no hidden costs or fees. We believe in making ideas accessible to everyone.

How do I register?+

Click the "Register" button on our website and fill out the registration form. You'll receive a confirmation email once your registration is processed.

When does registration close?+

Registration closes on December 10, 2025, or when we reach maximum capacity (100 attendees), whichever comes first. Register early to avoid disappointment!

Event Details

What is the event date and time?+

TEDxDPS Monarch will take place on December 13, 2025, from 3:00 PM to 5:40 PM. Please arrive by 2:50 PM for check-in and seating.

Where is the event located?+

The event will be held at DPS Monarch International School, Doha, Qatar. Detailed location information will be sent in your confirmation email.

What is the dress code?+

Smart casual attire is recommended. Feel comfortable, but remember this is a professional event celebrating ideas worth spreading.

Will there be refreshments?+

Yes! There will be a 10-minute refreshment break at 4:16 PM. Light snacks and beverages will be provided.

Speakers & Content

Who are the speakers?+

We have 9 incredible speakers including Dipa Swaminathan, Varun Duggirala, Abhilasha Bahuguna, Anoushka Jolly, and more. Visit our Speakers page for full bios and talk topics.

How long is each talk?+

Most talks are 10-15 minutes long, following the TED format. This keeps presentations dynamic and engaging while allowing multiple perspectives.

Will the talks be recorded?+

Yes, all talks will be professionally recorded and may be uploaded to the official TEDx YouTube channel (subject to quality review and speaker consent).

Can I ask questions to the speakers?+

Due to time constraints during the event, there won't be a Q&A session. However, speakers may be available during the refreshment break for brief conversations.

Logistics

Is parking available?+

Yes, parking is available at DPS Monarch International School. Follow the parking signs upon arrival. Additional parking information will be in your confirmation email.

Is the venue wheelchair accessible?+

Yes, the venue is fully wheelchair accessible. If you have specific accessibility requirements, please mention them in your registration form or contact us in advance.

Can I bring a guest?+

Yes, but each person must register separately. We have limited seating, so please register all attendees individually through our website.

What if I need to cancel my registration?+

If you can't attend, please email us at tedxyouthdpsmonarchintlschool@gmail.com as soon as possible so we can offer your seat to someone on the waiting list.

About TEDx

What is TEDx?+

TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. Our event is called TEDxDPS Monarch Intl School Youth, where x = independently organized TED event.

What does "Youth" mean in the event name?+

The "Youth" designation indicates this is a TEDxYouth event, focused on empowering and inspiring young audiences. Topics and speakers are chosen to resonate with youth perspectives.

Can I suggest a speaker or topic?+

We appreciate your enthusiasm! While our speaker lineup for this event is finalized, you can submit suggestions for future events by emailing us.

How can I get involved with TEDxDPS Monarch?+

We're always looking for volunteers, partners, and team members. Contact us at tedxyouthdpsmonarchintlschool@gmail.com to learn about opportunities.

Still Have Questions?

Can\'t find what you\'re looking for? Get in touch with us directly.
